from pipeline.pipeline import Pipeline
from pipeline.pipe import F
from pipeline.pipes_df import Drop, ToXy, OneToOne, ManyToOne, Select, ToHistoryY
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler

class InferenceFormatter(F):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__(lambda x: "[%s]" % (','.join(map("\"{0}\"".format, x[0].flatten()))))

def get_pipeline(y_column):
    pipeline = Pipeline([
        Select(['id','timestamp','credit_limit','inquiries','balance']),
        ManyToOne(['timestamp','credit_limit','balance'],StandardScaler(),['timestamp','credit_limit','balance']),
        ToHistoryY(['id'],2),
        InferenceFormatter()
    ])
    return pipeline
